divs: Sighting DetailsWE WERE WATCHING PLANES FLY OVER OUR HOUSE THAT EVENING WE NOTICED AN UNUSUALSOUNDIN A DIFFERENT PART OF THE SKY WHICH DREW OUR ATTENTION TO THE STRANGE OBJECTCOMMING TOWARDS US IT APPEARED TO BE TRIANGLE SHAPED WITH APROXAMATELYN 50 MULTICOLORED LIGHTS IT APPEARED TO HAVE A SYMBOL ON THE UNDER SIDE THAT CONSISTED OF2 HALF CIRCLES AND A LINE DOWN THE MIDDLE WE WACHT WITH AN EXTREME CALMNESS ANDINTRIGUE FOR APPROXAMATELY 5 MINUTES AS IT MADE ITS WAY ABOUT 60 DEGREES ACROSSANDTOWARD US UNTIL WE LOST SIGHT OF IT BEHIND SOME TREES ABOUT 5 MINUTS AFTER THEUFO PASSED OVER US AND CROSSED THE FLIGHT PATH OF THE LANDING AIR PLANES WENOTICED THE NEXT PLANE THAT FLEW OVER WAS MISSING ALL OF ITS WING AND LANDINGLIGHTS ON THE RIGHT SIDE OF THE PLANE WHICH WE HAVE NEVER SEEN BEFORE.
